description: A widget with a drop-down list of items to choose from.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

itemCount.description: The number of items to display.

itemText.description: A function that returns the string to display for a given index.

selectionIndex.description: The index of the currently selected item.

fillColor.description: The color of the background of the Picker - applies only to iOS.

borderColor.description: The color of the border of the Picker. On iOS this is a rectangular border around the Picker, on Android it is a single line below the Picker.

set.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

select.description: Fired when an item was selected by the user.

index.description: Contains the index of the selected item.
